entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET_TC_AggressiveTiering doesn't work as expected #101868
    Future
  • `PublishReadyToRun=true` significantly regresses startup time when used with `EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true` #101866
  • Erroneous linker error when using DAM attributes + primary constructors #101861
    9.0.0
  • Dll Search Path Behavior for Windows System Dlls for certain dotnet apps (WPF?) #101857
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests does not appear to actually run against .NET 8 #101846
  • Regarding Memory Leak Check in Android Platform with dotnet-gcdump #101847
  • (net9.0-ios preview 3) SRE not available when interpreter is enabled #101840
  • ThreadLocals and Finalization/GC #101839
  • Environment.ProcessPath / Environment.GetCommandLineArgs()[0] discrepancies #101837
  • [8.0] Test failure: Unknown chain building error in System.Net.Security.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #101835
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][osx] Test failure: ILLink.Tasks.Tests.TaskArgumentTests.TestRootDescriptorFiles #101833
  • [8.0][mono][interpreter] Native crash in System.Linq.Queryable.Tests #101831
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][ios][arm64][mono] Build error: SecKeychainUnlock signing-certs.keychain-db: user name or passphrase incorrect #101830
  • `ObjectFactory<T>` delegate should be covariant #101829

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #94479
    9.0.0
  • Enable multi-register intrinsics support for Arm64 #64921
    9.0.0
  • Stress issues on x86 in JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/V8/Crypto/Crypto/Crypto.dll #100695
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: reflection/DefaultInterfaceMethods/Emit/Emit.cmd #98973
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/delegate/regressions/devdivbugs/113347/DDB113347/DDB113347.cmd #98972
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #92574
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/synchronized/synchronized.cmd #96600
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Double #91746
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #92942
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections #95349
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 12/8/2023 12:07:17 AM #96498
    9.0.0
  • PublishReadyToRun=True regresses startup time when EnableCompressionInSingleFile=True #101862
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.LogicArray #96195
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regressions on 2/14/2024 8:50:48 AM #98706
    9.0.0
  • The StringBuilder.Append(Char[], Int32, Int32) method call throws the System.ArgumentOutOfRange exception in a valid situation when the app targets .NET 8 and built in the Release configuration #96839
    9.0.0
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler and NSUrlSessionHandler in the same net8.0-ios project causes incorrect 401 runtime errors for NTLM authorized HTTP requests #99892
  • Consider creating a ranged version of CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_BYREF #8627
    9.0.0
  • JIT should use boxing helper to box structs with many GC pointers #101699
    9.0.0
  • HMACSHA256 randomly throws: System.ArgumentException #100809
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span #95073
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 Regressions on 11/12/2023 8:47:21 PM #94724
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Int16 #89790
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently on Alpine 3.17 #83101
    Future
  • [Hanging test] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingOptionsCallback_Throws #86006
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'parent->OperGet() == oper' during 'LSRA allocate' #99810
    9.0.0
  • Cannot add System.Json to an Android .NET 8 project #101758

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable streaming by default for EventPipe sessions started by environment variable #101867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of Debugger.NotifyOfCrossThreadDependency under a debugger #101864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Min*/Max* APIs #101859
    arm-sve
  • Optimize 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' #101858
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • s390x: Fix nonvolatile context restoration #101854
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BitwiseClear and BooleanNot #101853
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Remove old JIT perf lab experiments; add block layout experiment #101852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Test RPO-based block layout in runtime-jit-experimental #101851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify/optimize Int128 comparison operators #101848
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix typos in TensorPrimitives MultiplyAdd documentation #101845
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add tests for OAVariantLib #101841
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • `explosed` -> `exposed` #101836
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: profile checking through inlining #101834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #101838
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [mono] Add check for generic types as target types #101850
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [PERF] Revert using specific dotnet-version changes. #101860
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Bulk copy of byrefs #101761
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add simple bitwise ops #101762
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Expose DOTNET_JitNoInline in Release #101798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't enable use-after-return checking on Apple's Clang #101781
    area-Infrastructure
  • LSRA: Remove assert that enforces all multi-reg RefPositions to be either copy or reload but not mixed #101824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trim instructionset name in helper #101794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark swift error as busy before call definition RefPosition #101792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #101832
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Pin net7.0 to 7.0.19 #101823
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [wasi][windows] Disable the wasi-aot-library tests on windows #101827
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Enable cross-block local assertion prop for natural loops #101763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running System.Runtime trimming tests #101592
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running S.L.Expressions trimming tests #101593
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport #92901) #101703
    area-Infrastructure
  • Typename parsing cleanup #101767
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure the scalar Reciprocal*Estimate APIs use AVX512 where possible #101800
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Integrate static web asset endpoints into wasm sdk #101315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] SVE Cleanup: Merging SVE_AE_3A, SVE_AN_3A, SVE_EP_3A, SVE_ER_3A, SVE_ET_3A, SVE_EU_3A into SVE_AA_3A #101785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
